resources.string: Game was added to database (view app inspection), favourites page is not working right now
Soccer Match Highlights App. Click on a game to view the details, and watch the highlights.On the details page you will be able to save your favourite games. Created by Ibrahim Mahfouz. Version 1.0.0

This is Movie Information application that requires your input to provide you with your movie information and poster if available in OMDB server You can add Favorite Movies to your account by clicking the heart shaped button
